Verses: 1 melum Suramandalangalaalum Thamburugalaalum Kaiththaalangalaalum, Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Aasaab, Emaan, Edhuththoon Enbavargalin Kumaararil Silarai, Dhaaveedhum Dhevaalaya Senaigalin Prabukkalum Oozhiyaththirkendru Piriththuvaiththaargal; Thangal Oozhiyaththin Kiriyaikkuk Kuriththuvaikkappatta Manushargalin Thogaiyaavadhu:
2 raajaavudaiya Kattalaippramaanamaaith Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Aasaappin Vasaththilirukkira, Aasaappin Kumaararil Sakkoor, Yoseppu, Nedhaaniyaa, Ashaarelaa Enbavargalum,

3 karththaraip Potrith Thudhiththuth Theerkkadharisanam Sollugira Thangal Thagappanaagiya Edhuththoonin Vasaththile Suramandalangalai Vaasikka, Edhuththoonin Kumaararaagiya Kedhaliyaa, Seree, Eshaayaa, Ashabiyaa, Maththiththiyaa Ennum Aaruperum,

4 kombaith Thonikkappanna, Dhevavishayaththil Raajaavukku Gnaanadhrushtiyulla Purushanaagiya Emaanin Kumaararaana Pukkiyaa, Maththaniyaa, Oosiyel, Sebuvel, Erimodh, Ananiyaa, Anaani, Eliyaaththaa, Kidhaldhi, Romandhiyesar, Yospegaashaa, Maloththi, Oththir, Magaasiyodh Enbavargalume.
5 ivargalellaarum Emaanin Kumaararaayirundhaargal; Dhevan Emaanukkup Padhinaalu Kumaararaiyum Moondru Kumaaraththigalaiyum Koduththaar.

6 ivargal Anaivarum Raajaavudaiya Kattalaippramaanamaaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Thaalangal Thamburugal Suramandalangalaagiya Keedhavaaththiyam Vaasikka, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Oozhiyamaaga Avaravar Thangal Thangal Thagappanmaaraagiya Aasaab Edhuththoon, Emaan Enbavargal Vasaththil Irundhaargal.
7 karththaraip Paadum Paattugalaik Katrukkondu, Nibunaraana Thangal Sagodhararodunkooda Avargal Lakkaththirku Irunootrenbaththettupperaayirundhaargal.
8 avargalil Siriyavanum Periyavanum, Aasaanum Maanaakkanum, Sarisamaanamaai Muraivarisaikkaaga Seettuppottukkondaargal.
9 mudhalaavadhu Seettu Aasaab Vamsamaana Yoseppin Pervazhikkum, Irandaavadhu Kedhaliyaa, Avan Sagodharar, Avan Kumaararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
10 moondraavadhu Sakkoor, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Panniranduper Vazhikkum,
11 naangaavadhu Isri, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Panniranduper Vazhikkum,
12 aindhaavadhu Neththaniyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
13 aaraavadhu Pukkiyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
14 ezhaavadhu Esarelo, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandupervazhikkum,
15 ettaavadhu Eshaayaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
16 onbadhaavadhu Maththaneeyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
17 paththaavadhu Simeyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
18 padhinoraavadhu Asaariyel, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
19 pannirandaavadhu Ashaabiyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
20 padhinmoondraavadhu Subavel, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
21 padhinaangaavadhu Maththiththiyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
22 padhinaindhaavadhu Eremodh, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
23 padhinaaraavadhu Ananiyaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
24 padhinezhaavadhu Yospekkaashaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
25 padhinettaavadhu Aanaani, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
26 paththonbadhaavadhu, Maloththi, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
27 irubadhaavadhu Eliyaaththaa, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
28 irubaththoraavadhu Oththir, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
29 irubaththirandaavadhu Kidhaldhi, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
30 irubaththumoondraavadhu Magaasiyodh, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum,
31 irubaththunaangaavadhu Romandhiyesar, Avan Kumaarar, Avan Sagodhararennum Pannirandu Pervazhikkum Vizhundhadhu.
